summary.para: Instruct restrictor how to proceed with black/white list checking
"AllList" instruct to check if the country Ip address exists in any of the white list or black list
"WhiteListOnly" instruct to check if the country Ip address exists in white list only
"BlackListOnly" instruct to check if the country Ip address exists in black list only

member.summary: Flag that instruct what is the allowance of countryIp address if not found in any of the white nor black lists
